name: Croakers Day
description:
Croakers day is a 2D platformer were you save the world from global warming. Croakers world has been turned upside down by the cruel Rich Coalman. Coalman has used fossil fuels for his own good, yet to only turn the world asunder. Follow Croaker as he overcomes a variety of environmental obstacles to restore nature to it's once green grace.

INSTRUCTIONS:

left-arrow (LEFT)     right-arrow (RIGHT)

A (LEFT)     D (RIGHT)

Space (JUMP)
